annotation.spannedText: The United States' long-standing vaccine safety system ensures that vaccines are as safe as possible

classMention.mentionClass: The United States' long-standing vaccine safety system ensures that vaccines are as safe as possible

annotation.spannedText: the United States has the safest, most effective vaccine supply in its history

classMention.mentionClass: the United States has the safest, most effective vaccine supply in its history

annotation.spannedText: The agency ensures the safety, effectiveness, and availability of vaccines for the United States

classMention.mentionClass: The agency ensures the safety, effectiveness, and availability of vaccines for the United States

annotation.spannedText: Before a vaccine is approved by the FDA for use by the public, results of studies on safety and effectiveness of the vaccine are evaluated by highly trained FDA scientists and doctors

classMention.mentionClass: Before a vaccine is approved by the FDA for use by the public, results of studies on safety and effectiveness of the vaccine are evaluated by highly trained FDA scientists and doctors

annotation.spannedText: If a link is found between a possible side effect and a vaccine, public health officials take appropriate action

classMention.mentionClass: If a link is found between a possible side effect and a vaccine, public health officials take appropriate action

annotation.spannedText: U.S. vaccine safety system continuously monitors for possible side effects after a vaccine is licensed

classMention.mentionClass: U.S. vaccine safety system continuously monitors for possible side effects after a vaccine is licensed

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are held to the highest standard of safety

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are held to the highest standard of safety

annotation.spannedText: Once in use, vaccines are continually monitored for safety and efficacy

classMention.mentionClass: Once in use, vaccines are continually monitored for safety and efficacy

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines, like any medication, can cause adverse events

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines, like any medication, can cause adverse events

annotation.spannedText: a decision not to immunize a child also involves risk

classMention.mentionClass: a decision not to immunize a child also involves risk

annotation.spannedText: It is a decision to put the child and others who come into contact with him or her at risk of contracting a disease that could be dangerous or deadly

classMention.mentionClass: It is a decision to put the child and others who come into contact with him or her at risk of contracting a disease that could be dangerous or deadly

annotation.spannedText: The most common side effects are mild

classMention.mentionClass: The most common side effects are mild

annotation.spannedText: many vaccine-preventable disease symptoms can be serious, or even deadly

classMention.mentionClass: many vaccine-preventable disease symptoms can be serious, or even deadly

annotation.spannedText: The side effects associated with getting vaccines are almost always mild (such as redness and swelling where the shot was given) and go away within a few days

classMention.mentionClass: The side effects associated with getting vaccines are almost always mild (such as redness and swelling where the shot was given) and go away within a few days

annotation.spannedText: Pay extra attention to your child for a few days after vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: Pay extra attention to your child for a few days after vaccination

annotation.spannedText: If you see something that concerns you, call your child�s doctor

classMention.mentionClass: If you see something that concerns you, call your child�s doctor

annotation.spannedText: Serious side effects following vaccination, such as severe allergic reaction, are very rare and doctors and clinic staff are trained to deal with them

classMention.mentionClass: Serious side effects following vaccination, such as severe allergic reaction, are very rare and doctors and clinic staff are trained to deal with them
